column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////After having ramen at a lot of places
column2: I feel Jinya is just about mediocre. Although I had my first ramen here and was blown away by it
column3: it was perhaps because I was having ramen for the first time. However
column5: and it is nice to start off with it. Their panna cotta is pretty good too
column6: although I am not a big fan of their mochi ice cream.
